<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Faultspawn](/Feats.aspx?ID=7197) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=641" />
<trait label="Nephilim" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=518" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [War of Immortals](/Sources.aspx?ID=232) pg. 53

</column>

---

You bear a grudge, inherited from a blasphemous asura forebear in your bloodline, against a particular deity and their works. You gain the Find Fault reaction.

**Find Fault** <actions string="Reaction" /> (concentrate) **Trigger** You attempt a saving throw against a spell or magic effect but haven’t rolled yet; Effect You find some kind of fault with the magic, using that flaw to protect yourself from the effect. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your saving throw against the triggering effect, which increases to a +2 circumstance bonus if the effect is [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579) and originates from a worshipper of the deity you chose for your grudge.

<title level="2">Faultspawn leads to...</title>
[Towering Presence](/Feats.aspx?ID=7208)
name: Faultspawn
